body.name: FIMEI Split Floor Lamp with Bright LED, Stepless Dimming, 3000K-6000K Color, Eye-Protection - For Living Room, Bedroom, Office
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 15 mins
features: 【Rotatable Dual Light Source Super Wide Lighting Range】This innovative split-designed floor lamp features two parts semicircle ring light as the dual light source. Each part can be flexibly rotated separately, allowing you to turn it 330 degrees horizontally and vertically at most to create a 1+1>2 wide lighting range, which is uniform, bright enough, and not dazzling.

【Applicable to Multiple Scenarios Standing Lamp】FIMEI standing lamps light up all kinds of life moments at home or office and create a healthy environment for adults and children. This stylish and elegant floor lamp is perfect for your bedside reading, study office, living room leisure, practice playing the piano, and so on, which adds an exquisite touch to your life.

【Stepless Color Temperature & Brightness Adjustment】You can easily adjust the color temperature from 3000K warm light to 6000K cold white light stepless; easily adjust the brightness from 5% to 100% by long pressing the button on the pole or by using the remote. Customize your comfort zone and enjoy a soothing gradient light experience.

【Stable and Space-saving Base】With scientific base counterweight and stable and space-saving base, this tall standing lamp has a thin chassis design with a moderate size of 25cm/9.84in diameter. It can also be inserted under the sofa and bed, saving space and preventing tripping.

【Double Control Methods & Memory Function】Control the lamp by button on the pole or remote, whichever you want. The magnetic remote can also be stored on the lamp pole to avoid losing it. The memory function allows the light to remember its previous setting, so the next time you turn it on, it will return to the same setting it was on when you turned it off. (2*AAA batteries for the remote are not included in the package)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications: Color: Black, White, Gray Material: Metal, Plastic Wattage: 20W Luminous Flux: 1300LM Color Temperature: 3000K-6000K Brightness Adjustment: 5%-100% stepless dimmable Adapter Voltage: DC24V, 1A Input Voltage: AC100-240V, 50/60Hz FIMEI Split-designed Modern Creativity Floor Lamp Create a Light and Easy Life with Simplicity Features: √ Dual Light Source Super Wide Lighting Range √ Separately Rotatable Light Head √ Applicable to Multiple Scenarios √ Stepless Color Temperature Adjustment √ Stepless Brightness Adjustment √ Stable and Space-saving Base √ Double Control Methods √ Simple Assembly & Memory Function Dimensions: Top Ring Light Diameter: 12.2 inches (31 cm) Total Lamp Height: 69 inches (175 cm) Base Diameter: 10 inches (25 cm) Base Height: 1 inch (2.5 cm)

Stepless Color Temperature & Brightness Adjustment Color Temperature: 3000K to 6000K 3000K - Warm light 4000K - Warm white light 5000K - White daylight 6000K - Cool white bright light Switch Color Temperature: √ By using Touch & Remote Adjust Color Temperature Stepless: √ By using Remote Only (Press and hold the corresponding button) Light Brightness: 5% to 100% Switch Light Brightness: √ By using Touch & Remote Adjust Light Brightness Stepless: √ By using Touch & Remote Single-touch any place on the induction line area on the lamp control panel can TURN ON/ADJUST the light with the according brightness level. Slide up/down to adjust the brightness stepless. Customize your comfort zone and enjoy a soothing gradient light experience!

Touch Control & Remote Control You can control the lamp by using the button on the lamp or remote. The remote can also be stored on any magnetic object, which is very convenient.When using the remote, please pair the remote and the lamp first: Install 2 AAA batteries and press and hold the first button on the upper left for 3-5 seconds, plug in the lamp (note that still hold down the remote control button). Then the floor lamp flickers which means the pairing is successful."1H" for one hour auto-off: Every time you click the button, the timer will restart. If you want to stop the one-hour setting, turn off the lamp and turn it on again.The central button on the remote is a one-key switch to the light setting of 4000K color temperature and 100% brightness. Easy Assembly & Stable Base FIMEI modern floor lamps can be easily assembled without tools in just a few minutes. Screw each section of the lamp together from top to base. When assembling, please avoid damaging the wires by pulling them excessively.With a scientific base counterweight and stable and space-saving base, this tall standing lamp has a thin chassis design with a moderate size of 25cm/9.84in diameter. It can also be inserted under the sofa and bed, saving space and preventing tripping. Separately Rotatable Design Each lamp head can be flexibly rotated separately, allowing you to turn it 330 degrees horizontally and vertically at most to create a 1+1>2 wide lighting range, which is uniform, bright enough, and not dazzling.

Enjoy Parent-child Night Time Unlike the high power, power consumption, and glare traditional ceiling lamp, FIMEI comfortable light perception can make reading and writing more focused. Accompanied by warm lights, you can read a book, lie on the sofa, listen to music, or watch movies. Also, you can enjoy parent-child reading and entertainment time. Living Room Lighting Solve the problem of the dim lighting in some areas. Put the lamp next to the sofa in the living room, turn on the light, and enjoy the quiet time. Warm lights increase happiness, and soft light embellishments make your home warm and loving. Soft Light Warms Quiet Night Turn the light towards the ceiling or wall to get diffuse reflection light. The soft light is comfortable and does not disturb sleep. With the timer function, the lights will automatically turn off after one hour. Unload the tiredness of the day and sleep peacefully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice modern lamp.
reviews.reviewText: We had a floor lamp that sits behind the couch. My SO constantly complained that he could see the lamps reflection in the TV, which ruined the view for him. That, and the lamp was getting to the point of replacement, just in general.I spotted this and immediately thought it was the perfect solution. While it takes some assembly (a bit of which was not immediately apparent) - it is a joy to use. (It took me about 10 minutes to assembly, but mainly because I was confused for a bit on the proper method).First, the top section is split and each can be independently turned to point at the ceiling, behind, or forward (or anywhere in between). Very nice for getting the lighting where you want.It also has a reading lamp - which I figured my SO would hate (but I would find useful), but my SO actually likes it as well.The temperature (color) and intensity (brightness) of both the top lamp and reading lamp are adjustable through several levels.The lamp is controlled by two switches on the pole itself (which can be a bit tricky to get exactly what you want dialed in) - but it also comes with a remote, which is a joy to use. The left side controls the top lamp and the right side controls the reading lamp. Easy to understand buttons.The best feature of the remote is that it has a magnetic back - and sticks quite nicely to the lamp (just about anywhere), keeping it always easy to find and use.Great lamp that solved a number of problems for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What I Wanted
reviews.reviewText: The lamps were exactly what I wanted. I was looking for a good floor lamp with white or blue light to light up my living room, which is also more or less my office. The regular red lights in my apartment are dim, and don't provide enough light for someone who works nights and rarely if ever gets to make use of natural sunlight.I was encouraged by other reviews to give these lamps a try, and I like their rotatable design a lot. They don't just look cool, they also help me get the light right where a need it depending on whether or not I'm working at the computer, or sitting on the couch doing crocheting when I'm not busy.Ratings (keep in mind that I have two.)Brightness: 5/5Almost as good as natural light through my glass doors during the day. Helps keep me peppy through the night.Assembly: 4/5Easy assembly. You just need to unpack it and screw everything together. The power cord is already run through the segments, so you just need to line them up properly and screw them in, then unite the lamp rod with the base. The hardest part about putting these lights together was cutting through the little plastic baggies protecting the rod segments. Not really sure why they bothered to waste the plastic, honestly. Maybe to keep the Styrofoam packing from clinging to the rods?IMPORTANT! BATTERIES FOR THE REMOTE ARE NOT INCLUDED! You need (2) AAA batteries for each remote!Ease of use: 3.9/5The little instruction booklet is pretty bad. Basically one page in several languages showing you how the lamp screws together, and nothing on the remote's functions. That said, it's pretty easy to figure out if you play with it for a moment.To save you some time, the remote has two power buttons, one for the main lamp head and one for the reading lamp head. Beneath these buttons are a series of functions you can swap through for each lamp head. The main lamp head buttons are directly below its power button, and vice versa. Lets you adjust the brightness of the lamp, and the color of the light from each. You can adjust each lamp head to a unique setting independent of each other.The remote controllers are magnetic, too, so that's kind of cool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do not hesitate to buy this floor lamp it is excellent
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic floor lamp. It is very bright for reading, has a selection of light colors and intensities for reading or subtle lighting of a room. The flexible ring light is excellent for reading in a chair and useful for Zoom meetings. The other ring light is great for general room lighting or display of wall art.I have the lamp in my law office by my reading chair and it is elegant, smart looking, small and easy to use. The remote feature means I can turn it on and off from my desk across the room and is very useful. After having the floor lamp in my office for over 3 months now I can tell you that it is a fantastic lamp and better than any other lamp I have ever owned or seen in another office or home. Buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Need more lighting in one room and it nicely brighten up the need. Like the remote control option l, but the magnet on the back of remote needs to be stronger. So four stars. But, overall works great and enjoy the different light settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp and great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this lamp in June of 2023 for its height, style, and options. The design and functionality were well thought out, and we are happy with it. I did experience an issue with an electronic problem with the original lamp, so I contacted FIMEI, and they really were helpful and stood by their product. We determined that a replacement was necessary and they sent one right out. I am happy to have the replacement in plac, sinc I still love the function and look of it. It is very bright and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed light in living room. The reading light will be excellent for just that with my Kindle, or printed book. The components can be aimed to light some collectibles. Easy to assemble and set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright, sturdy, and nice looking
reviews.reviewText: We've had this for a few weeks now and love it. Our living room is dark this time of year but it brightens up the 300 Sq ft all on its own! The features are fun and makes our room look more elegant.
Su armador muy fácil el diseño moderno y lucidor tiene intensidad de luzMuy practica

reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic modern FIMEI LED floor lamp! 5-minute assembly time. Bright lights. Easy remote control.
reviews.reviewText: PROS:- Fantastic modern stylish FIMEI LED floor lamp!- Easy to assemble within 5 minutes and I didn't even bother with the instructions.- SAFETY FEATURE - The LED's are cold to lukewarm to the touch depending on the brightness level which makes this a much safer lamp option than traditional torchiere lamps with very hot halogen filaments or bulbs (and there is no light hum or buzzing either like halogen lamps typically have, particularly when dimmed).- The dual LED torchiere lamp and reading light are very bright and have numerous settings for brightness, dimming, as well as warm white or cooler white light options to suit your taste.- Remote control is simple to operate with separate buttons for the torchiere lamp as well as the reading lamp, so they can be switched on and off or have their brightness or colour settings adjusted INDEPENDENTLY which is very convenient and impressive.- Button panel area on the lamp pole has soft blue light illumination, so you can locate the lamp in the dark and that panel is magnetic to attach the remote for safekeeping.- Nice heavy metal base for this lamp which should keep it sturdy provided your flooring/carpeting is level.- Packed well in Styrofoam in its box with protective plastic wrapping for all parts to prevent damage.CONS:None. This lamp is outstanding!OVERALL RATING:A+ for style and function. This was a great purchase and I purchased two more recently when they were on sale. This lamp far exceeded my expectations.

reviews.reviewTitle: MODERN AND STYLISH DESIGN WITH GREAT FUNCTION
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to put together and looks stylish & beautiful (see the photos taken immediately after its installation). The base is heavy enough to keep it stable and safe from tipping over.The functionality of this lamp is great, the tone 4 color temperature option and brightness +/- option on the lamp pole and Magnetic remote control are smart ideas and extremely useful and convenient for consumers.I had some issue with the lamp initially but the customer service was very knowledgeable and helpful. They worked with me to resolve it and the lamp works 100% as per description. Thank you Iris !!!Happy with this purchase and it far exceeded my expectation, I would definitely buy it again.

The media could not be loaded. De las mejores compras para mí oficina en casa! Se ve de excelente calidad, es bella, fácil de armar, muy cómodo el control remoto. Ambas lámparas tienen control por separada, puedes prender la que más utilices o juntas. Tengo poco tiempo con ella, espero no se dañe rápido, pero sin duda hasta este punto la recomiendo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great multiple functions on the lamp and remote
reviews.reviewText: The tone options are very nice to have on both lights and the dimers have a wide range of options. You can use the remote to change anything and turn it on and off, both lights are controlled separately. You can twist the top lights in any positions (360 both) manually. The lamp buttons (touch bar style) allow you to change the light tone with a single touche and dim it if you stay on it (same for top and bottom lamp).Very easy to assemble, stable and not heavy. Looks very good!Only downside is that if you are not using the remote and try to turn off the lamp using the touch bouton (more like a touch bar), you have to push 4 times to go through all the tones and then it turns off, while the remote has an on/off button. If there is this option and I haven't found it feel free to indicate it!
